markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Fence](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3430)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Fences make themselves indispensable to the underworld by paying for stolen goods only to resell them later, whether through a seemingly legitimate business or to a closed group of elite buyers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Fence](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3430)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 21

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Accounting Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +13, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +10, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Fence's Eye** Fences can use [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) to identify an item's value and [Identify Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2365) on an item. They gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Underworld Lore checks when doing so, and to all Underworld Lore checks related to stolen items.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (10), [lesser darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), [Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), [lesser smoke ball](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3360) (2), [Thieves' Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 70

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Fence's Feint** <actions string="Single Action" />  The fence [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390), then can Step. If the Feint succeeds, the target is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the fence's melee attacks until the end of the fence's next turn (or to all melee attacks on a critical success).

**Quick Rummage** <actions string="Single Action" />  The fence always has a few items close at hand. The fence Interacts to draw a weapon or an item that takes a single action to activate, and then Strikes with the weapon or Activates the Item.

**Sneak Attack**   The fence deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-533" />
name: Fence
